text: nissandeh hamane tauraat utaaree, jisamen maargadarshan aur prakaash tha. nabee jo aagyaakaaree the, usako yahoodiyon ke lie anivaary thaharaate the ki ve usaka paalan karen aur isee prakaar allaahavaale aur shaastravetta bhee. kyonki unhen allaah kee kitaab kee suraksha ka aadesh diya gaya tha aur ve usake sanrakshak the. to tum logon se na daro, balki mujh hee se daro aur meree aayaton ke badale thoda mooly praapt na karana. jo log us vidhaan ke anusaar faisala na karen, jise allaah ne utaara hai, to aise hee log vidharmee hai
